isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - ENGINE COOLANT LEVEL SYSTEM - TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: Use the EST to monitor the coolant level on the data list or to retrieve fault codes from the fault code list. Also prior engine events can be retrieved using the EST in the calibration data screen under the Event Log. This will display the total number of times the event has taken place, the engine hours, the odometer reading at which the last two events have taken place.
